title.text: Building a Tool for Annotating Reference in Discourse

abstractContent.text: We discuss the development of a system for marking several types of reference to facilitate the analysis of reference in discourse.

The tool is designed to be used in three applicationsi generating training data for machine learning of co-reference relations, evaluating iheories of referring expression generation and resolution in texts, and developing theories for understanding reference in dialogs.
